trans-unit.source: An audio listener is an entity that listens for audio emitted by audio emitters to create spatialized audio. There can be multiple audio listeners in a scene. This is common, for example, in multiplayer games, where each player camera is an audio listener.
trans-unit.target: An audio listener is an entity that listens for audio emitted by audio emitters to create spatialized audio. There can be multiple audio listeners in a scene. This is common, for example, in multiplayer games, where each player camera is an audio listener.

trans-unit.source: You don't need to configure audio listeners. All settings for sound effects, including Volume and Pitch (Frequency), are configured on the audio emitter.
trans-unit.target: You don't need to configure audio listeners. All settings for sound effects, including Volume and Pitch (Frequency), are configured on the audio emitter.

trans-unit.source: If there's no audio listener in the scene, you won't hear audio from audio emitters.
trans-unit.target: If there's no audio listener in the scene, you won't hear audio from audio emitters.

trans-unit.source: Add an audio listener component to an entity
trans-unit.target: Add an audio listener component to an entity

trans-unit.source: To create an audio listener, attach an audio listener component to an entity. You can attach this component to any entity.
trans-unit.target: To create an audio listener, attach an audio listener component to an entity. You can attach this component to any entity.

trans-unit.source: In Scene view, select the entity you want to be an audio listener:
trans-unit.target: In Scene view, select the entity you want to be an audio listener:

trans-unit.source: In the Property Grid, click Add Component and select Audio listener component:
trans-unit.target: In the Property Grid, click Add Component and select Audio listener component:

trans-unit.source: The entity is now an audio listener.
trans-unit.target: The entity is now an audio listener.

trans-unit.source: !Warning On iOS, you can create multiple objects with Audio listener component in a scene, but only one is used at runtime.
trans-unit.target: !Warning On iOS, you can create multiple objects with Audio listener component in a scene, but only one is used at runtime.
